thread.title: Goldsmith experiences first ace Oct. 6 at RGC
thread.title_full: Goldsmith experiences first ace Oct. 6 at RGC

author: news@courierpublicationsllc.com (Staff)
title: Goldsmith experiences first ace Oct. 6 at RGC
text:
Goldsmith experiences first ace Oct. 6 at RGC By Staff | Oct 08, 2015 
Rockland â€” Larry Goldsmith experienced his first career hole-in-one on Tuesday, Oct. 6 at the Rockland Golf Course. 
Goldsmith aced the 155-yard, par-3 18th hole using a 7-iron for his tee shot. 
The shot was witnessed by Victor Goldsmith, Jorgen Heiddemann and Leslie Cole. 
There have been a handful of aces at RGC this season.
